about_the_game:
Open world + Tetris =?
Read this, you will find the answer.

More than Tetris

In Wall Breaking world, Every room is different Tetris puzzle, you need use your wisdom to break the wall! And find the way out the black.


For more good, most of things in Wall breaking world is can be elimited, and each time you do elimination, you will get Tetris's pow, it is some kind of magic pow, that will help you to make some powful spell.

Open world

In Wall Breaking world, you will never see level pick panel. Each time you break the wall of current Tetris room, you can chose next target by your owner mind,


And the final target is try to find the way out of the world.


You will love the journey.

Multiple Spell

As you got the powfull energy: Tetris pow, ofcause you will learn kinds of spells.
The ice spell: Pow of Ice

The Electric spell: Pow of Electric


what was the next? You will find it by youself.

Huge Puzzle

Except the Tetris room, we created some huge puzzle for you.
In Huge Puzzle, you need face more Complex game mechanics.
For example, Double Tetris Room, you need eliminate the cube at tow synchronization room.

Final fight

of cause you will need to fight ,use your sword or your spell.
beat the final monster or find the way to avoid the fight.

Open world + Tetris =?, Are you find the answer? Yeah, add WISH LIST at now!

Open world + Tetris =?
Read this, you will find the answer.

More than Tetris

In Wall Breaking world, Every room is different Tetris puzzle, you need use your wisdom to break the wall! And find the way out the black.


For more good, most of things in Wall breaking world is can be elimited, and each time you do elimination, you will get Tetris's pow, it is some kind of magic pow, that will help you to make some powful spell.

Open world

In Wall Breaking world, you will never see level pick panel. Each time you break the wall of current Tetris room, you can chose next target by your owner mind,


And the final target is try to find the way out of the world.


You will love the journey.

Multiple Spell

As you got the powfull energy: Tetris pow, ofcause you will learn kinds of spells.
The ice spell: Pow of Ice

The Electric spell: Pow of Electric


what was the next? You will find it by youself.

Except the Tetris room, we created some huge puzzle for you.
In Huge Puzzle, you need face more Complex game mechanics.

of cause you will need to fight ,use your sword or your spell.
beat the final monster or find the way to avoid the fight.

name: TEFFECT: Wall Breaking

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win7 or more
  • Processor: Any of it

short_description: Open world + Tetris =? Answer is Tquest: Wall breaking! #Open the world for adventure, and complete the level freely #Collect more than 5 spells, including frost, fire, hurricane and lightning. There is always one for you #Tetris is not only Tetris, but also joint puzzles for you to challenge
